text: Kevin Gomes de Oliveira (born 24 June 1998) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Liga 1 club Borneo. Mainly a left-back, he can also play as a central defender or a defensive midfielder. ==Career== ===Kalteng Putra=== On 2019 season, he joined Indonesian Liga 1 club, Kalteng Putra and made his debut against Persebaya Surabaya. ===Borneo=== On 2020 season, he joined Indonesian Liga 1 club, Borneo and made his debut against Persija Jakarta. ==Personal life== Kevin is the son of the legend of Persebaya Surabaya, Gomes de Oliveira who now as an coach of PSMS Medan. ==References== ==External links== *Kevin Gomes at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Araxá Esporte Clube players Category:Borneo F.C. players Category:Kalteng Putra F.C. players
title: Kevin Gomes de Oliveira
